General.Name: Hindusthan National Glass & Industries Limited
General.Description: Hindusthan National Glass & Industries Limited manufactures and sells container glass bottles in India and internationally. It serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical and wellness, beer and liquor, and household and cosmetics markets. The company was incorporated in 1946 and is based in Kolkata, India.
